summary: Teaches the move Brick Break, a reliable Fighting-type physical attack (75 power, 100% accuracy) that also removes the opponent's Reflect, Light Screen, and Aurora Veil.
typical_users: Physical attackers needing coverage against Normal, Rock, Steel, Ice, and Dark types
Pokémon to counter screens-based stall teams
Common users include Lucario, Infernape, Blaziken, and various sweepers lacking Fighting-type moves
